Hello!

I'm Erke, a software engineer based in the UK. I enjoy creating things that live on the internet, whether that be websites, applications, or anything in between. My goal is to always build products that provide pixel-perfect, performant experiences.

Projects

Manjo: a food-ordering social marketplace application for university students.

Omnifood: a landing page for a subscription-based meal delivery platform.

Spoilage: a chart for visualising and analysing spoilage data.
